CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Stellar Grid Solutions relative to Borealis Renewables?
SRP.A: Stellar Grid Solutions is {above} Borealis Renewables in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Borealis Renewables relative to Stellar Grid Solutions?
SRP.A: Borealis Renewables is {below} Stellar Grid Solutions in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total carbon emissions?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Borealis Renewables}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total carbon emissions?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Stellar Grid Solutions}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Stellar Grid Solutions's maximum Carbon Emissions in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Stellar Grid Solutions's maximum Carbon Emissions is in {1999}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Stellar Grid Solutions's minimum Carbon Emissions in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Stellar Grid Solutions's minimum Carbon Emissions is in {1982}.

NC.Q: Was the total Carbon Emissions in 1995 higher or lower than in 1996?
NC.A: The total carbon emissions in 1995 was {lower} than in 1996.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 1997, did the total Carbon Emissions experience a larger or smaller change than between 1989 and 1994?
NC.A: The change in total carbon emissions between 1987 and 1997 was {larger} than between 1989 and 1994.

NC.Q: Was the total Carbon Emissions in 1990 higher or lower than in 1994?
NC.A: The total carbon emissions in 1990 was {lower} than in 1994.

NC.Q: Between 1994 and 1995, did the total Carbon Emissions experience a larger or smaller change than between 1995 and 1996?
NC.A: The change in total carbon emissions between 1994 and 1995 was {smaller} than between 1995 and 1996.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Borealis Renewables} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Stellar Grid Solutions and Borealis Renewables first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Stellar Grid Solutions and Borealis Renewables first exchanged leading positions in {1984}.
